Reichs Pferdemeister
Overview
Original
Situated in Aschburg
Back taxes and Ottmar Fulcade
Weather damage
Current
Over the last six months nothing of great note has happened. You have gone on goose chases, and dead end investigations, spent some time fixing the Reichs, and some time in study.
The place is largely run by Yohann (looks like Jürgen Prochnow, Manager) and Apollonia Pflüger (Cook and Manager) and their three teenage children Salomea, Ottilie and Caspar.
Adalfrit .. blonde hayley mills type, is the bar maid, and deals with customers
The orphans Matilde, Holda, Noldil, and Baltzer do odd jobs, are provided room and board, and get reading and writing lessons on Sundays from Apollonia (who is quite devout)
Roof is mostly fixed (replaced), there's a tarpaulin over a small section of old thatching that's functional but will be replaced.
Floors 1-3 of the main building are habitable, but only half of the third floor is furnished and whitewashed.
The mews is completely operational and functional
Occupancy rate has picked up a little.
The kitchen and beerhaus are running
A local brewer Ulf Reininghaus and his son Dietrich visits to manage the beer brewing
A young farrier Ernestus (Ern) Steinner runs a business and pays rent out of the smithy
Yosh and Shtan Shmenge visit to pick up the night soil around breakfast time.
Future Problems
Accusations of prostitution
Pressure from the local thieves guild for protection money.
